aboutMe.name: About
aboutMe.text: I am a compassionate person who enjoys having fun and joking around while knowing when to lock in and take things seriously. I hold values such as respect, kindness, integrity and mindfulness. I also pride myself on being honest and transparent. I enjoy improving myself and encouraging others. My interests are almost endless but my favourite hobbies are exercising, MMA, football, web development and design, drawing, music, watching movies and spending time with my loved ones.

work.description: I worked for the company as their agent for just over 3 years. My duties included recruiting people for ads and movie roles and to do the admin to make sure everyone was on our books

testimonials.name: Cameron Michaels
testimonials.message: Zen's coding prowess is undeniable. His commitment and skill set him apart in our class. He's destined for success in the coding world.

testimonials.name: Caleb Okkers
testimonials.message: I am grateful to call Zen a close friend and a colleague who I truly admire. He has great work ethic, analytical and problem solving skills. He thrives in collaborative settings as well as when he works on his own. He is kind, generous and hilarious. Zen would be a valuable asset to any organization.

testimonials.name: Jordan Springveldt
testimonials.message: Zen's dedication to mastering coding is truly commendable. His passion for the craft shines through in every line of code he writes. As a fellow student, I've witnessed firsthand his unwavering commitment to excellence. With his sharp problem-solving skills and meticulous attention to detail, Zen is undoubtedly a rising star in the coding world.

testimonials.name: Chandre Davids
testimonials.message: Zen is one of the most talented people I know in terms of design, whether it be clothing or coming up with themes for his new upcoming projects. He definitely is someone you should watch out for!

testimonials.name: Mohammad Mohamed
testimonials.message: Zen is hard working, has high work ethic and eagerness to help others already makes him such a talented developer. Once you see his projects or designs, you'll realize that he is an amazingly skilled developer who has a bright future in this industry.

testimonials.name: Matthew Brown
testimonials.message: Zen has shown exceptional coding skills throughout the course. With a strong grasp of programming concepts and impressive problem-solving abilities, Zen is poised for success in any coding endeavors
